Posts.Content: hey Nelly bean    Im in the same position as u finished treatment , and now feel kinda numb and empty, its like my safety net of treatment has gone, ive read a few people feel same as this at end of treatment, so im hoping it leaves me in time, send me a PM if u want to chat   Debs x
Posts.Title: after treatment

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed back in 2011 with bc, and my surgeon told me to give up with immediate effect cos of the problems with healing....i panic'd, then someone told me about herbal cigs, (available from most health food shops) this lets u get rid of the nicotine and not have to think bout giving up the habit, i found i was so sick on chemo that i couldnt face a cig and not smoke now for over a year wooot go me lol.  im sure if u try the herbals u can too x Debs x
Posts.Title: BC and smoking

Posts.Content: I had mine done about a year post treatment, but make sure u dont have it done on the side of the op...due to lymphodema risk
Posts.Title: Tattoo after BC

Posts.Content: Hello Everyone I am 2 years post diagnosis and after left mx ...8 sessions of chemo...25 sessions of rads and a year on tamoxifen, now feel ready to give something back, wondered if anyone here from the Essex area, feel id like to set up a support group in local area to help people with the minefield that comes with the diagnosis. Any Ideas would be great  Thanks Debs
Posts.Title: 2 Years down the line

Posts.Content: Thanks Kate  I will call them tomorrow...just want something good to come sh*tty disease Debs x
Posts.Title: 2 Years down the line

Posts.Content: I might be up for some of that too lool fancy a bit of airbrushing on me bits and my fetching skinhead :)
Posts.Title: Amazonian Warriors - Challenge - Who wants to be in a calendar ??

Posts.Content: Hey if its any help, im also 3 years post....and was told by BC consultant that the weight id put on from tamoxifen would fall off when i change to post menopause meds...because tamoxifen weight goes round your tum...so as you can guess cant wait to change...hope this helps but check it out with doc if worried
Posts.Title: worried about weight issue

Posts.Content: Finished all my treatments...MX..4 FEC ...4 Tax plus 5 weeks of radiotherepy, now taking Tamoxifen for 5 years, but still feel so crappy most of the time.  I feel like ive got no energy, I see other people getting back on with their lives and is as much as i can do to do one household job a day.  I just want some normality back. Oh also have lymphodemia in my arm that flares up and thats not helping.   sorry for my lil rant i should be glad im over the worst of my treatment   Debs x
Posts.Title: When do i get "Me" back

Posts.Content: Hi   Sorry to hear your going through this too..i had exactly the same ..try sorbet raspberry or lemon i found best..i found i ate things that i normally hate like custard ewwww, also as mentioned try putting fresh pineapple in freezer and suck like a lolly this seems to break throught the furry feeling but i couldnt find anything to get rid of the taste for about 7 days each treatment hope this helps a little    debs x
Posts.Title: Loss of taste/horrible taste in mouth

Posts.Content: Omg I forgot about Bovril ...i was same only drank at swimming gala's as a kid but was a life safer with the furry..dog poo..tasting mouth   Debs x
Posts.Title: Loss of taste/horrible taste in mouth

Posts.Content: Try vaseline on eyelids and optrex spray mist ...its expensive but works fantastically hope this helps Debsx
Posts.Title: sore eyes..Anyone else?
